block_comment: It seems there's an error in your request. The given Verilog RTL code is "endmodule" which only signifies the end of a Verilog module. However, there isn't any complete module or block of code provided. In order to generate a suitable comment, a complete code block or module including input, output, and internal logic is required. Kindly provide a complete block of Verilog RTL code.
